items.title_en: Australian PURITI Manuka Honey MGO 350+ (1kg)
items.title_zh: 澳洲PURITI 麥盧卡蜜糖 MGO 350 (1kg)
items.desc_en:
🌿 Product Features
Medium-High Activity Grade: Contains 350mg of methylglyoxal (MGO) per kg, equivalent to UMF 12+–13+, with significantly higher antibacterial activity than daily health-grade honey.
Natural Antibacterial Power: Effectively fights bacteria, supports the immune system, and helps maintain healthy defenses.
Gut Protection: Helps soothe gastrointestinal discomfort and supports digestive health.
Throat Care: Ideal for those with dry or itchy throats, frequent speakers, or individuals in people-facing professions.
Pure Sourcing: Harvested from unique Manuka flower fields in New Zealand, 100% natural with no artificial additives.

🎯 Suitable For
✅ Individuals with frequent throat discomfort, coughs, or dryness
✅ Those with sensitive stomachs or needing gastrointestinal protection
✅ Professionals frequently exposed to crowds (e.g., teachers, healthcare workers, salespeople)
✅ Health-conscious individuals seeking a higher level of protection than daily health-grade honey

💡 Recommended Usage
1–2 teaspoons daily, either consumed directly or added to warm water/tea
Avoid high temperatures (e.g., hot water, cooking) to preserve active compounds
Increase intake during periods of throat discomfort

🏆 Why Choose MGO 350?
More potent than MGO 250 → Ideal for those needing stronger immune support
More affordable than MGO 550/800 → Best value in the medium-high grade range
Suitable for the whole family → From daily health maintenance to targeted care, one jar meets all needs

🇳🇿 Origin: New Zealand
items.desc_zh:
🌿 產品特點
中高活性等級：每公斤含有 350mg 甲基乙二醛 (MGO)，相當於 UMF 12+–13+，抗菌活性明顯高於日常保健級。
天然抗菌力：有效對抗細菌，支持免疫系統，幫助維持健康防護。
腸胃保護：有助舒緩腸胃不適，支持消化系統健康。
喉嚨護理：適合喉嚨乾癢、說話多或經常接觸人群的工作者。
純淨來源：採自紐西蘭獨特麥盧卡花叢，100%天然，無添加人工成分。

🎯 適合人群
✅  經常喉嚨不適、咳嗽或乾癢的人
✅  腸胃敏感、需要保護的人
✅  工作中經常接觸人群（老師、醫護、銷售）
✅  想要比日常保健更高一級的健康守護者


💡 建議食用方式
每天 1–2 茶匙，可直接食用，或加入溫水 / 溫茶中飲用
避免高溫（如熱水、烹飪），以保留活性成分
出現喉嚨不適時，可加強食用

🏆 為什麼選擇 MGO 350？
比 MGO 250 更高效 → 適合需要更強免疫支持的人群
價格比 MGO 550/800 更親民 → 中高等級中的最佳性價比
全家適用 → 從日常保健到針對性護理，一瓶即可

🇳🇿 產地：紐西蘭

🍫 Refreshing mint chocolate flavor with an unexpectedly exhilarating taste!
🌟 Fluoride+ formula effectively cleans teeth and fights cavities
🌿 Gentle on enamel, safe for daily use
😋 Unique taste makes brushing more enjoyable for both adults and children

items.title_en: Skin Control Pimple Patch Party Pack (36 pack)
items.title_zh: Skin Control 可愛暗瘡貼 ( 36片)
items.desc_en:
Your 24/7 Skin Recovery Companion
🌞 Daytime Protection: Adorable patterns instantly conceal blemishes while shielding skin from dirt and irritation, keeping your look flawless.
🌙 Nighttime Repair: Gently covers spots, prevents bacterial growth, absorbs secretions, and speeds up healing.
✨ Always Ready: Transparent and ultra-thin design stays discreetly in place during workouts or outings.
💖 Skin-Friendly: Free of medicated ingredients with gentle formulation suitable for most skin types.
items.desc_zh:
日夜修護好幫手
🌞 日間保護：可愛圖案秒遮痘痘，還能隔髒卸負，守護你的顏值
🌙 夜間修護：溫和覆蓋，防止細菌滋生，吸收分泌物，加速癒合
✨ 隨時使用：透明輕薄，貼服不易脫落，運動外出皆可安心
💖 呵護肌膚：無藥性、溫和設計，適合大部分膚質

Classic Multi-Balm, Bestseller in the UK

items.title_en: T2 Tea French Earl Grey Tea Bags (10 pack)
items.title_zh: T2 法式伯爵茶茶包（10包裝）
items.desc_en:
T2, a renowned tea brand from Australia, combines traditional tea-making craftsmanship with innovative spirit to bring you a unique tea experience.

✨ Flavor Characteristics
French Earl Grey Classic is crafted with a robust black tea base, blended with sweet fruity notes, rose, sunflower, and hibiscus petals, and enhanced with bergamot and fruit accents—redefining your perception of Earl Grey tea.

☕ Brewing Suggestions:
• Hot Brew: Steep in boiling water for 2-3 minutes. Enjoy plain or with a slice of lemon for a refreshing twist.
• Cold Brew: Ideal for a crisp, refreshing taste on a summer afternoon.
• Recommended to avoid adding milk to fully appreciate its rich floral and fruity notes.
items.desc_zh:
來自澳洲的知名茶品牌T2，融合傳統製茶工藝與創新精神，為您帶來獨一無二的品茶體驗。

✨風味特色
 法式經典伯爵茶以以甘醇紅茶為基底，加入 甜果香、玫瑰、向日葵、木槿花瓣，再添上佛手柑和果香，顛覆您對伯爵茶的想像

☕ 沖泡建議：
以沸水沖泡2-3分鐘，純飲或加入一片檸檬，風味更清新

items.title_en: Dermal Therapy Tinted Lip Balm Rose Pink (8g)
items.title_zh: Dermal Therapy 有色潤唇膏 – 玫瑰粉色(8g)
items.desc_en:
Dermal Therapy is an Australian professional skincare brand specializing in scientifically formulated products for dry skin, chapped lips, and related concerns. Its clinically tested products are trusted by healthcare professionals and deliver visible restorative results.

💄 Soft Rose Pink – naturally brightens lip color
💧 Infused with moisturizing essence to keep lips hydrated all day
✨ Smooth texture for easy application and a healthy glossy finish
items.desc_zh:
Dermal Therapy 是澳洲專業護膚品牌，專注研發針對乾燥肌膚、乾裂嘴唇等問題的科學配方。其產品經臨床驗證，深受醫療專業人員信賴，並能帶來可見的修護效果。

💄 柔美玫瑰粉，自然提亮唇色
💧 含保濕精華，一整天滋潤雙唇
✨ 質地柔滑，輕鬆上色，打造健康光澤唇感

items.title_en: Dermal Therapy Tinted Lip Balm Peach Nude (8g)
items.title_zh: Dermal Therapy 有色潤唇膏– 蜜桃裸色(8g)
items.desc_en:
Dermal Therapy is an Australian professional skincare brand dedicated to developing scientifically formulated products for dry skin, chapped lips, and related concerns. Its clinically tested products are trusted by healthcare professionals and deliver visible restorative results.

💄 Sweet Peach Nude – naturally enhances lip color
💧 Moisturizing formula nourishes lips, keeping them soft and hydrated
✨ Glides on smoothly for a natural glossy finish
items.desc_zh:
Dermal Therapy 是澳洲專業護膚品牌，專注研發針對乾燥肌膚、乾裂嘴唇等問題的科學配方。其產品經臨床驗證，深受醫療專業人員信賴，並能帶來可見的修護效果。

💄 甜美蜜桃裸，自然修飾唇色
💧 滋潤配方，呵護雙唇，保持柔軟水潤
✨ 柔滑易塗，打造自然光澤唇妝

items.title_en: Carusos Total Beauty Collagen Powder 100g
items.title_zh: Caruso's Total Beauty® 膠原蛋白粉 (100g)
items.desc_en:
🌟 Clinically Proven, Highly Effective Revival
Utilizes German Verisol® patented hydrolyzed collagen peptides, clinically proven to deliver:
→ 4 weeks: Significantly improves skin hydration and reduces dryness
→ 8 weeks: Reduces fine line depth (-20%) and enhances elasticity
→ 12 weeks: Increases collagen density and visibly improves firmness

✨ Triple-Action Synergy for Holistic Beauty
✅ Stimulates Collagen Renewal: Targets the dermal layer to improve sagging and pores
✅ Antioxidant Protection: High-concentration grape seed extract defends against free radical damage
✅ Strengthens Nails & Hair: Vitamin C + Biotin for radiant beauty from within

Suggested Use
Take 5g (1 scoop) daily, mixed with 100mL of water or your favorite beverage, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

⚠️ Store in a cool, dry place below 25°C. ⚠️
items.desc_zh:
🌟 專利實證，高效煥活
採用德國 Verisol® 專利水解膠原蛋白肽，臨床實證：
→ 4週：肌膚含水量顯著提升，乾燥度減少
→ 8週：細紋深度減少（-20%），彈性增強
→ 12週：膠原蛋白密度增加，緊緻度明顯改善

✨ 三重協同效應，綻放全方位美麗
✅   刺激膠原再生：直擊真皮層，改善鬆弛與毛孔
✅   抗氧化防護：高濃度葡萄籽精華，抵禦自由基傷害
✅   強化指甲髮絲：維生素C+生物素，由內而外綻放光采

建議用量
每日一次5g（1 勺） 粉末加入 100mL 水或喜愛飲品中，或依照醫療專業人員指示服用。

⚠️儲存於攝氏 25 度以下陰涼乾燥處⚠️

items.title_en: Carusos Total Beauty Collagen (60 Tablets)
items.title_zh: Caruso's Total Beauty® 膠原蛋白 (60片裝 )
items.desc_en:
🌟 Clinically Proven, Highly Effective Revival
Utilizes German Verisol® patented hydrolyzed collagen peptides, clinically proven to deliver:
→ 4 weeks: Significantly improves skin hydration and reduces dryness
→ 8 weeks: Reduces fine line depth (-20%) and enhances elasticity
→ 12 weeks: Increases collagen density and visibly improves firmness

✨ Triple Synergy for Comprehensive Beauty
✅ Stimulates Collagen Renewal: Targets the dermal layer to improve sagging and pores
✅ Antioxidant Protection: High-concentration grape seed extract defends against free radical damage
✅ Strengthens Nails & Hair: Vitamin C + Biotin for radiant beauty from within

Suggested Use
Adults take 2 capsules daily with meals, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

⚠️ Store in a cool, dry place away from high temperatures. ⚠️
items.desc_zh:
🌟 專利實證，高效煥活
採用德國 Verisol® 專利水解膠原蛋白肽，臨床實證：
→ 4週：肌膚含水量顯著提升，乾燥度減少
→ 8週：細紋深度減少（-20%），彈性增強
→ 12週：膠原蛋白密度增加，緊緻度明顯改善

✨三重協同效應，綻放全方位美麗
✅   刺激膠原再生：直擊真皮層，改善鬆弛與毛孔
✅  抗氧化防護：高濃度葡萄籽精華，抵禦自由基傷害
✅   強化指甲髮絲：維生素C+生物素，由內而外綻放光采

建議用量
成人每日 2 粒，隨餐服用，或依醫療專業人員指示。

⚠️儲存於陰涼乾燥處，避免高溫⚠️

items.title_en: Healthy Care Propolis Liquid  (25ml)
items.title_zh: Healthy Care 蜂膠液（25ml）
items.desc_en:
Feeling under the weather during season change? Looking for protection for the entire family? Australian Natural Propolis Extract – your essential health must-have!

🇦🇺 Sourced from pure Australian propolis, it utilizes advanced extraction technology to preserve its natural active ingredients (such as flavonoids). Free from alcohol, artificial flavors, and preservatives, it is gentle and non-irritating, ensuring every drop provides you with the purest natural protection.

✨ Benefits
• Enhances Defense: Rich in flavonoids to strengthen the immune system and maintain healthy vitality
• Soothes Throat: Just a few drops effectively moisturize mucous membranes, relieving dryness and discomfort
• Oral Hygiene: Reduces oral discomfort and maintains fresh breath
• Gentle and Safe: Alcohol-free formula, safe for the whole family to use

💧 Usage Recommendations
• Adults: Up to 3 times daily, take 5-8 drops mixed in water, or as directed by a physician
• Daily Maintenance: 1-2 times daily to boost immunity
• Enhanced Protection: Can be increased up to 3 times daily

⚠️ Shake well before use. Natural variations in color and texture may occur between batches due to its pure ingredients – this is normal and safe for consumption.
items.desc_zh:
換季易不適？全家需要守護？澳洲天然蜂膠精華，您的健康必備！

🇦🇺來自澳洲純淨蜂膠，採用先進萃取技術保留其天然活性成分（如類黃酮），無添加酒精、人工香料及防腐劑，溫和不刺激，確保每一滴都為您提供最純粹的天然保護力。

✨ 功效
•  增強防護：豐富類黃酮強化防御機制，維持健康活力
•  舒緩喉嚨：數滴即可有效滋潤黏膜，緩解乾癢不適
•  潔淨口腔：減少口腔不適，保持清新氣息
•  溫和安全：無酒精配方，全家老少均可安心使用

💧 使用建議
• 成人每日最多3次，每次取 5-8滴 加入水中飲用，或遵醫囑
• 日常保養：每日1-2次，增強防護力
• 加強防護：可增加至每日3次

⚠️ 使用前請充分搖勻。天然蜂膠色澤與質地可能因批次不同而有些微差異，此為正常現象，請放心食用。

items.title_en: Designs for Health – OmegAvail 1250 (120 softgel capsules)
items.title_zh: Designs for Health OmegAvail 1250魚油 (120粒裝)
items.desc_en:
High-Potency, Ultra-Pure Omega-3 Fish Oil – Supports Cardiovascular System Function and Brain Health

A potent non-GMO fish oil supplement, each softgel contains 1,250 mg of high-concentration Omega-3 oil. Each softgel provides 668 mg EPA and 260 mg DHA, along with other Omega-3 fatty acids, delivering superior efficacy compared to ordinary fish oils. Ideal for adults seeking high-efficiency supplementation.

Ingredients:
Concentrated Fish Oil Omega-3 Triglycerides 1.25 g
(Equivalent to 750 mg Eicosapentaenoic Acid [EPA] and 250 mg Docosahexaenoic Acid [DHA])

🌟 Key Benefits
❤️ Heart Health & Lipid Support: High EPA content helps reduce triglycerides, maintain healthy blood pressure, and support circulation.
🧠 Brain & Memory Enhancement: Rich DHA boosts memory, focus, and cognitive performance.
🔥 Anti-Inflammatory & Joint Care: Reduces internal inflammation, alleviates joint discomfort, and modulates immune response.
👁️ Eye Health: DHA helps relieve dry eye fatigue and maintains retinal health.
⚡ High Absorption: Utilizes rTG (re-esterified triglyceride) form for superior purity, faster absorption, and maximum benefits.

Suggested Use for Adults:
Take 1 to 2 softgels daily, or as directed by a healthcare professional.
items.desc_zh:
高強度、超純 Omega 3 魚油，支援健康的心血管系統功能和大腦健康。一款強效非基因改造魚油，每粒軟膠囊含 1,250 毫克高濃度 Omega-3 油。每粒軟膠囊含有 668 毫克 EPA 和 260 毫克 DHA，以及其他 Omega-3 脂肪酸，效力超越普通魚油，適合需要高效補充的成年人。

成份：濃縮魚油 Omega-3 三酸甘油酯 1.25 克（相當於二十碳五烯酸 EPA 750 毫克、二十二碳六烯酸 DHA 250 毫克）

🌟 主要功效
❤️ 護心降脂：高濃度EPA助降三酸甘油酯、維持血壓與循環
🧠 健腦增憶：豐富DHA增強記憶力、專注力與認知表現
🔥 抗炎護關節：減少體內發炎，改善關節不適，調節免疫
👁️ 明眸護眼：DHA緩解乾眼疲勞，維持視網膜健康
⚡ 高效吸收：rTG型式純度高、吸收快，發揮最大效益

成人建議用量：每日服用 1 至 2 粒膠囊，或遵醫囑。

15 highly active probiotic strains, 64 billion CFU per capsule, delivering double the probiotic power—1 capsule = 2x the benefits! Scientifically formulated to support gut and immune health 💪

✅ Restores beneficial gut bacteria
✅ Balances microbiota ecology

items.title_en: Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with 5% Glycolic Acid  (100ml)
items.title_zh: ALPHA-H黃金精華 (含5％ 甘醇酸)  100ml
items.desc_en:
ALPHA-H Liquid Gold｜Overnight Youth Revival Elixir
Powered by advanced skin renewal technology, this treatment works while you sleep to stimulate healthy cells, targeting fatigue, sun damage, hyperpigmentation, fine lines, and wrinkles at their source. Wake up to firmer, brighter, and more radiant skin. Celebrated globally for 25 years, Liquid Gold helps you awaken with a youthful glow.

🌙 Award-Winning, Globally Loved
💖 Overnight Repair: Reduces fine lines and fades dark spots
✨ Brightens & Firms: Enhances radiance and boosts elasticity
🍃 Gentle Exfoliation: Promotes collagen production
✅ Gentle Formula: Suitable for all skin types

How to Use
Apply 3 times weekly (every other night) after cleansing. Soak a cotton pad and sweep evenly over the face, neck, and décolletage, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Those with sensitive skin may follow with a moisturizer for added comfort.

⚠️ Note: A mild tingling sensation is normal. For nighttime use only.
items.desc_zh:
ALPHA-H 黃金精華液｜夜間喚醒年輕肌
專注高效煥膚科技，睡眠中刺激健康細胞，從源頭改善倦容、曬傷、色素沉澱、細紋與皺紋，重現緊緻透亮肌膚。全球暢銷25年，黃金精華液讓你醒來就擁有年輕光澤。

🌙 皇牌產品，深受全球愛用
💖 睡眠修護，淡化細紋與色斑
✨ 提亮膚色，提升彈性
🍃 輕柔去角質，促進膠原蛋白生成
✅ 溫和配方，適合所有肌膚

使用方法
每週約 3 次（隔晚使用），於睡前潔面後，以化妝棉均勻塗抹於臉部、頸部與胸口，避開眼唇位置。敏感肌可在吸收後搭配保濕霜加強舒緩。

⚠️ 貼心提醒：輕微刺痛屬正常反應，建議只於夜間使用。
